nodes.text: Three flight was a call sign used by Rogue Squadron around 7 ABY. The members of Rogue Squadron, Three flight were Rogue Nine, the Corellian Corran Horn, Rogue Ten, the Gand Ooryl Qrygg, Rogue Eleven, the Human Lujayne Forge from Kessel and Rogue Twelve, the Rodian Andoorni Hui.

Rogue Squadron's Three flight members encountered great misfortune during the First Battle of Borleias when Rogue Twelve's ship was destroyed and Hui killed, Rogue Ten's ship was destroyed and the pilot Qrygg was ejected into space, Rogue Nine's ship was disabled and Rogue Eleven was murdered in her sleep, by stormtroopers, shortly before the battle.
A flight group designated One Flight was also used by Wraith Squadron, led by Wes Janson.
